doc:
Frankie Avalon https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Frankie_Avalon 0 Frankie Avalon (born Francis Thomas Avallone; September 18, 1940) is an Italian-American actor, singer, and former teen idol. Avalon had 31 charted U.S. Billboard singles from 1958 to late 1962, including the number one hits "Venus" and "Why" in 1959. Frankie_Avalon ( born Francis_Thomas_Avallone ; September_18_,_1940 ) is an_Italian-American_actor , singer , and former_teen_idol . Avalon had 31 charted U.S._Billboard_singles from 1958 to late_1962 , including the_number_one hits " Venus " and " Why " in 1959 .
